item.title: SepLLM: Accelerate Large Language Models by Compressing One Segment into One Separator
item.description: SepLLM shrinks LLMs, speeding them up by over 50% without losing much accuracy.

item.title: ILLUME: Illuminating Your LLMs to See, Draw, and Self-Enhance
item.description: ILLUME: A unified multi-modal LLM efficiently integrates visual understanding & generation, achieving competitive performance with significantly less data.
